text: The 1943–44 Liga Bet was the fifth season of second tier football in Mandatory Palestine. The season began on 30 October 1943,Day of Victories to Maccabi Teams HaBoker, 31 October 1943 and was played until the summer break, on 24 June 1944. Initially seven teams competed in the league,משתתפי ליגה מלחמתית ב' Davar, 22 October 1943 but after several weeks more teams, including reserve teams of Palestine League teams were added to the line-up. By the end of the season, no team played all its matches and the season was never completed. ==League table== ==References== Category:Liga Bet seasons Palestine 2
title: 1943–44 Liga Bet
